data.message: 😳😳 we live in Barrow-in-Furness and yes I realise it's a giant cul de sac and rarely anything comes here so people have accepted having to travel to see attractions BUT why have you scrapped Lancaster/Morecambe off the list?? At least that was only an hour away! The nearest one now is Manchester.....disappointed!!! ☹️☹️

replies.message: Hi Lisa, the truck tour is a huge logistical challenge and takes our teams months of planning in advance with both councils and communities. In previous years we have visited many different locations across GB, but sadly, as mentioned we can't visit every one, each year. We're really sad to hear you're disappointed and will be sure to share your feedback with our teams.
